title: 8:51 On the Blinking Clock and Other Stories
description: The unknown. The tragic. The twisted.Journey to lands unknown and times forgotten - and pray that you're still the same when you return!Compiling 30 stories and poems of horror and mystery, 8:51 On the Blinking Clock and Other Stories will take you through the darkest parts of the human psyche and force you to question your own motivations and beliefs. Inside you'll meet Lynn, a mother who has more on the menu than just potatoes; or Artle Unsean, an artist whose main ingredient is death; or Professor Peece, who sends his students on a scavenger hunt - for blood! You'll also meet Blia, whose entire staff of employees mysteriously disappears; the Washingtons, a mysterious couple who quickly moves into a town ravaged by tragedy - with perhaps sinister intentions; or Scout, owner of a unique clock capable of altering reality. Set your clock to 8:51 - and keep the lights on!
author: Giovanni Crisan
